backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister managing rooms, messages, moderation (mute, block, report), and user profiles with counters and retention limits.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module exposing a run function that returns an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a build-fix feature to affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including hooks, pages, components, data modules, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, AppShell, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: Empty placeholder file for an admin password prompt component.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageActi: Dropdown menu for muting, blocking, and reporting messages with a report dialog and backend sync.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Message input box handling authentication, profile readiness, send validation, and backend message submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders a scrollable chat message list with auto-scroll, avatar display, timestamps, and moderation filtering.
Provides the main app layout including header, content area, and bottom navigation with area selection display.
frontend/src/data/indiaStateCentroids.ts: Exports approximate latitude/longitude centroids for Indian states and union territories for location-based state matching.
frontend/src/data/indiaStates.ts: Defines stable IDs and labels for all Indian states and union territories used for area selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonProfile.ts: Loads or generates a persistent anonymous profile and provides an update helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useAreaSelection.ts: Manages selected area, persists it, and provides geolocation-based closest-state auto-selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthControls.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth with helpers for safe login, logout, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, loading, login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Handles local mute/block lists and filters messages accordingly, persisting state to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching rooms, messages, and performing room/message mutations via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides unified user profile management for authenticated and anonymous users, including backend loading, auto-creation, and updating.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light/dark modes, plus global background and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for an admin page.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Renders a chat interface showing messages for a room with polling and a message composer.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the login UI with Internet Identity-based authentication and redirects after login.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Displays rooms filtered by area, supports searching and creating rooms with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React settings page handling location access, area selection, profile updates, and login/logout actions using multiple hooks and UI components.
Generates, loads, and saves anonymous user profiles with random IDs, nicknames, colors, and avatars in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/areaSelectionStorag: Manages persistence of area selection and location-enabled state, and exposes a list of available areas including all Indian states.
frontend/src/utils/auth/isAuthError.ts: Provides helpers to detect authentication-related errors and extract safe, truncated error messages.
frontend/src/utils/auth/postLoginRedirec: Stores, retrieves, and clears post-login redirect paths using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/location/closestIndia: Computes the nearest Indian state to given coordinates using Haversine distance and predefined centroids.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL/hash.
frontend/src/utils/validation/principalT: Validates and parses user-entered Principal IDs, returning either a parsed Principal or an error.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature requests related to deployment fixes and removal of admin-role backend functionality.
